name: dpl-starter-project
description: This project has devise_token_auth, react_router, etc setup. - uses rails v6, ruby 3.0.2 - devise axios  - devise_token_auth  - react - react-router - axios - react bootstrap - styled components - proxy set to localhost:3001 - gem "faker" - folder structure - custom hooks to provide Authentication data

scripts.build: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build && npm run deploy && echo 'Client Built'
